raw:
****CASTING CALL****
PROJECT: Caterpillar Social Media Campaign
ROLE: Santa
SHOOT DATE: FRI., 11/14
CALL TIME: 1:30-5 pm
LOCATION: Edwards, IL
RATE: $750 plus mileage to and from Peoria
USAGE: Usage: In-Perpetuity.  Caterpillar owns full rights to use footage however they see fit.  Full in-perpetuity.  Non-negotiable.  Talent Service Agreement will need to be signed before talent arrives.  Do not submit to this casting call if this is not agreeable.  
_____________________________________________________________________
LOOKING FOR A MALE who has played or can play Santa Claus. 
AGES: 50-70, Caucasian, Real Beard preferred.
YOU MUST HAVE AN EP CASTING PROFILE TO BE CONSIDERED!!!
_____________________________________________________________________
If interested and available, and have your EP Casting Portal Profile complete, please send an email to: 4starcasting@gmail.com with the following:
1) Subject Line: SANTA
2) In the submission email include name, age range, height, weight, city and zip, phone and email.
3) Attach a current, right-now photo of your face and full body in JPEG format. Make sure the photo is taken with decent lighting. The lighting should reflect your actual skin tone. 
*NOTE: Rename the title of your photos with your Full Name. You should do this with all your submission photos.
We MUST have a current look that REFLECTS your current hair!!!  
1) Please confirm that you can drive yourself to Edwards, IL.
2) Are you allergic to glue or adhesives? Yes or No
3) Please confirm you understand the usage
4) List any experience you have playing Santa
If you are selected to audition we will send you information to send in a self tape asap.
To be considered, you must register with us at www.4starcasting.com. Your submission will be deleted if you do not include photos.

My first thought John B. BOSS.
Thank you everyone for all the love. I am on the short list and waiting for client review.
Mark Kish are you ready to play Santa?
Can I wear makeup to look Caucasian?
Lisa Godsey Gale should look into this
